name: Html.Form.Input

aliases.name: Element
aliases.comment: All inputs will be defined by this basic structure
aliases.type: { id : String , label : String , helpBlock : Maybe.Maybe String , value : Html.Form.Input.FormValue (Maybe.Maybe v) , onValue : Html.Form.Input.FormValue (Result.Result e v) -> Signal.Message }

aliases.name: FormElement
aliases.comment: An element with de and encoder
aliases.type: { element : Html.Form.Input.Element v e , props : a , decoder : String -> Result.Result e v , encoder : v -> String }

aliases.name: FormValue
aliases.comment: The input string of the user and the parsed value

aliases.name: InputElement
aliases.comment: Spec for an input with a type
aliases.type: Html.Form.Input.FormElement v e { type' : String, extraClasses : List String }

aliases.name: SelectElement
aliases.type: Html.Form.Input.FormElement v e { choices : List v, displayChoice : v -> String }

values.name: mayStringFormVal
values.comment: Generate a FormValue for textual input boxes w/o validation

values.name: stringFormVal
values.comment: Generate a FormValue for textual input boxes w/o validation
